brand_identity.name: Digital Ninja App Builder
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with SaaS utility.
Content is King: The user's app is the hero; the builder is the invisible hand.
Contrast: High contrast for controls, subtle canvas for building.
Negative Space: Dense controls, open canvas.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Feature names

body.usage: UI controls, paragraphs, inputs, data tables

mono.usage: Code snippets, API keys, IDs, Technical data

buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 rounded-md transition-colors

auth.layout: Split screen: Left side form (clean, minimal), Right side art/testimonial (dark, immersive).
auth.style: Glassmorphism card for the form if on a background, or clean flat white on left.

dashboard.layout: Sidebar navigation (collapsible). Top header with breadcrumbs and user menu. Main content area with 'Control Room' grid.
dashboard.widgets: Use 'Card' component with 'CardHeader' and 'CardContent'. No gradients on cards, just clean white with subtle borders.

builder.canvas: Background pattern (dots or grid) to distinguish from UI. Center the editable area.
builder.panels: Dense UI, smaller text (text-xs or text-sm), high contrast borders.

admin.layout: Data-heavy. Use 'Table' component heavily. Status badges (pill shaped).
admin.diagnostics: Use 'Alert' components for system health. Green for good, Red for bad, Yellow for warning.

do_not: Do NOT use generic 'Inter' for headings.
Do NOT use teal/purple as primary colors (stick to Slate/Indigo).
must_do: MUST use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.
MUST implement hover states for all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the 'Digital Ninja App Builder'. Follow these guidelines strictly. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Implement the 'Space Grotesk' font for headings by importing it from Google Fonts in index.css. Use the defined color palette in tailwind.config.js. Focus on the 'Builder' interface being highly functional and the 'Marketing/Auth' pages being visually striking.
